channel.title: Recruiting (new posts)
channel.description: Posts in the forum category "Recruiting" - Villages OTHER than the Wiki Village

item.title: RPG Village:
item.content:encoded: ">"[shin kibito یک خائن بلاعوض و نجار برنج بادام زمینی است!]

item.title: anybody know about any village exploding sometime in September 2010?:
item.content:encoded: Dot dot dot dot dot dot get woke upwards w/ t. King Borger

item.title: Rail Village nearing goal: Rail Village nearing goal
item.content:encoded:
Hi there!

Rail Village is currently about 20 ninjas away from our goal of exploding.

We have daily kaiju! We are fighting major kaiju now. We have zombjas. We have free stuff for newcomers. I've been giving out RP when I get the chance.

Yes, we can bingo people now.

Remember, you don't have to be active to help an Impossible Mission village. You can be idle and still reap the rewards!

Come join us!

item.title: Rail Village!:
item.content:encoded:
UPDATE: We are now up to 62 upgrades and plan on adding more! We have daily kaiju.

Come join us and help us blow up! :D

item.title: Rail Village!:
item.content:encoded:
UPDATE: We have joined the war and we have a natural research facility.

We have 10 villagers and we are adding more upgrades all the time, thanks to Snake Oil and Snake Oil Lite.

Come join us! Thank you!

item.title: Rail Village!: Rail Village!
item.content:encoded:
Rail Village needs ninjas!

We are an Impossible Mission village. Need Survived the Impossible? Help us grow and blow up!

If you already have Survived the Impossible, you can still help :) You can get free stuff from the storehouse, plus every new ninja helps make our village a better place.

We have tacos! Lots of tacos. And other useful stuff, while supplies last.

Thank you!

item.title: Arrow Village: Arrow Village
item.content:encoded: currently recruiting anyone to join my village need help with setting up.

item.title: Hinode Village: Hinode Village
item.content:encoded: Hi, I'm Doro, kage of the Hinode Village. We just started up and only have three villagers, and we definitely need more. So, regardless of rank, please consider joining. :)

item.title: looking for a village: looking for a village
item.content:encoded: im wanting to get sti but cant seem to find a village. anyonee looking?

item.title: Sunglasses Village:
item.content:encoded: We're still recruiting, auto-accept on. We're rich for starting out, lots of perms available and fun villagers who will help. We just need a couple more people to get started.

item.title: Sunglasses Village: Sunglasses Village
item.content:encoded: I just started my village, Sunglasses Village, with some people from my old one, New Kamina, because we had great fun in that one. So we're trying to build a new, fun village which helps people get along in the game. We accept everyone and help our villagers to the best we can

item.title: Fallen Village: Fallen Village
item.content:encoded:
So we've got everything we need for the Impossible Mission, except enough villagers.

Anyone who hasn't got Surivived the Impossible should come join us.

The village has all upgrades up to Tier Two, including ROOT and Pizzawitch access.

While we're waiting to fill up, we have a daily patrol raffle for 10RP and 2 TACOs between everyone who patrolled the previous day. We also have regular Kaiju fights.

item.title: DarkWolf Village: DarkWolf Village
item.content:encoded:
The DarkWolf Village currently has these stats:
Current Kage:Narutopwr1(Main season 4 currently on the way to looping.)Narutopwr2(Alt)
Village Size:2
Largest Size to Date:2
Current Tax Rate:2%
Current Upkeep:12%
War Status:Not Joined
Recruiting Status:Open
Resources:
Brilliant Crystals:14

Upgrades

1. Banker
2. BillyCon Center
3. Blaring Music
4. Carapace Walls
5. Chunin Training School
6. Collection Squad
7. Creepy Traps
8. Forest Trail
9. Fortified Walls
10. Genin Training School
11. Hitaiate Maker
12. Infiltration Academy
13. Meditation Rooms
14. Militia
15. Natural Research Facility
16. Ninja Attack Squad
17. Nonja Farm
18. Overseers
19. Party House
20. Robo-Maids
21. Robot Guards
22. Saboteur School
23. Science! Facility
24. Sentry Squads
25. Siege Engines
26. Solidarity
27. Spy Towers
28. Tofu Shop
29. War Council
30. Wind Wards

As you can see there aren't many villagers in the village,the only way village count would increase is if YOU join and help make this a better village.If you have any suggestions to make it better,feel free to post a message and share your ideas.

item.title: RPG Village: Re: RPG Village
item.content:encoded:
We're a tier 3 village and still recruiting. Kaijus everytime. R00t, zombjas, pizzawitch, Major Kaiju and much more. +80 Stamina/day.

Join us. We now have chocolate.

item.title: anybody know about any village exploding sometime in September 2010?: anybody know about any village exploding sometime in September 2010?
item.content:encoded: like the title says

item.title: Oshoku Village is recruiting!: Oshoku Village is recruiting!
item.content:encoded:
We are one of the top-tier villages.

We have:
164 Upgrades
A new Kaiju everyday, or a Major Kaiju every 3rd day
Zombjas
Every day Science! activation.
You get RP for invading, spying, milling and Major Kaiju bashing.

Our Village is good for:
-New Members : You will get extra Stamina so you can level faster, you have higher drop rates, get +1 Stamina, and so much more.
-Mid-Old Members: You can finish your Missions (like mono, reaper, r00t) easier with all of our Upgrades. You can also take items from Storehouse without problems if you need something.
-Old Members: You can have all the fun like Invading, spying, and other things if you are finished with everything else.

Just type ZephX3 in your application and you'll be accepted!

item.title: crossover village: crossover village
item.content:encoded: i just created it recently so all i have is me and nonja's but if i dont have any people by the time i have 20 nonja i will post and people who join after that time will not have to collect Resources if they dont want to, I currently have five nonja

item.title: Cipher village recruitment: Cipher village recruitment
item.content:encoded: Cipher village is a brand new village but y'know, all great villages have to start somewhere, right?

item.title: Join The Immortal Realm of Soviet: Re: Join The Immortal Realm of Soviet
item.content:encoded:
Update again:
We have defeated all the Minor Kaiju and have been summoning several of them more than once but got tired of beating on the same monsters every day. Because of this we bought the Elemental Beacon bringing us up to Tier 3. This means we'll be summoning Major Kaiju as well starting tomorrow morning.

item.title: Looking for someone to take over Chaos Village: Re: Looking for someone to take over Chaos Village
item.content:encoded: don't need anymore
